original_title: 本当にあった怨霊恐怖動画9
overview: The ninth horror documentary released by the staff of the "Real Vengeful Ghost Horror Video" series. Includes all 10 gruesome posted videos that have been lifted with the preparedness of the curse. Here is the most terrifying message from an evil spirit who left this world with a strong grudge, caught by chance in everyday images.
title: Real Vengeful Ghost Horror  Video 9
